document.full_text: the resignation of president dilma rousseff's top aide is unlikely to cause major upheaval in brazilian financial markets on wednesday, but it could lead to more government spending and a generally less market-friendly approach in months to come.
document.title: resignation of brazil's palocci leaves a void
lines_and_colors: the resignation of president dilma rousseff's top aide is unlikely to cause major upheaval in brazilian financial markets on wednesday, but it could lead to more government spending and a generally less market-friendly approach in months to come.
